Name: Weight Qualifier
Notes: Code defining the type of weight
Remarks: P010203: If either AT8-01, AT8-02 or AT8-03 are present, then the others are required

Name: Lading Quantity
Notes: Number of units (pieces) of the lading commodity
Remarks: AT804 is the quantity of handling units that are not unitized (for example a carton). When added to the quantity in AT805, it is the total quantity of handling units in the shipment.

Name: Lading Quantity
Notes: Number of units (pieces) of the lading commodity
Remarks: AT805 is the quantity of handling units that are unitized (for example on a pallet or slip sheet). When added to the quantity in AT804 it is the total quantity of handling units for the shipment.

Name: Volume Unit Qualifier
Remarks: P0607: If either AT8-06 or AT8-07 is present, then the other is required
